c4_context.mermaid_template:
C4Context
  title System Context Diagram - {system_name}
  Person(user, "{user_name}", "{user_desc}")
  System(system, "{system_name}", "{system_desc}")
  System_Ext(ext, "{external_name}", "{external_desc}")
  Rel(user, system, "Uses")
  Rel(system, ext, "Calls API")
c4_context.use_case: Show how the system fits into the world

c4_container.mermaid_template:
C4Container
  title Container Diagram - {system_name}
  Person(user, "User")
  Container(web, "Web App", "React", "SPA frontend")
  Container(api, "API Server", "Node.js", "REST API")
  ContainerDb(db, "Database", "PostgreSQL", "Stores data")
  Rel(user, web, "Uses", "HTTPS")
  Rel(web, api, "Calls", "JSON/HTTPS")
  Rel(api, db, "Reads/Writes", "SQL")

er_diagram.mermaid_template:
erDiagram
  USERS ||--o{ ORDERS : places
  ORDERS ||--|{ ORDER_ITEMS : contains
  PRODUCTS ||--o{ ORDER_ITEMS : "included in"

flowchart.mermaid_template:
flowchart TD
  A[Start] --> B{Condition?}
  B -->|Yes| C[Action 1]
  B -->|No| D[Action 2]
  C --> E[End]
  D --> E

state_diagram.mermaid_template:
stateDiagram-v2
  [*] --> Draft
  Draft --> Published: Publish
  Published --> Archived: Archive
  Archived --> Draft: Restore
  Published --> Draft: Unpublish
state_diagram.use_case: Show state transitions (order status, user lifecycle)

deployment.mermaid_template:
graph LR
  subgraph CDN
    CF[CloudFront]
  end
  subgraph Compute
    ECS[ECS/Fargate]
  end
  subgraph Data
    RDS[(RDS PostgreSQL)]
    Redis[(ElastiCache)]
    S3[S3 Bucket]
  end
  CF --> ECS
  ECS --> RDS
  ECS --> Redis
  ECS --> S3
